import crashmenulogo6 from "../assets/crashmenulogo6.webp"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const menuRef = useRef(null); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (event) => { if (menuRef.current && !menuRef.current.contains(event.target)) { setIsOpen(false); } }; document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside); }, []); return (
